p: The seeds of the plants are known as ‘Black cumin’ in English, In Arab countries, they are known as ‘Habba Al-Sauda’ or ‘Habba Al-Barakah’. The popular Urdu name of this plant is ‘Kalonji’. It is known as ‘Siyah Danch’ and Cork out in Persian and Turkish respectively. The plant is also known as Love-in-a-mist, Habatul Barakah, Sonez, Krishana, Jiraka and Sidadanah ( Sultan et al., 2012).
